inputQueryDetails.query:
SELECT 
    CASE
        WHEN GROUPING(SalesQuarter)=1 AND GROUPING(SalesYear)=0  AND GROUPING(PRODUCT)=0 THEN 'Year Total'
        WHEN GROUPING(SalesQuarter)=1 AND GROUPING(SalesYear)=1  AND GROUPING(PRODUCT)=0 THEN 'Sub Total'
        WHEN GROUPING(SalesQuarter)=1 AND GROUPING(SalesYear)=1  AND GROUPING(PRODUCT)=1 THEN  'Grand Total'
        ELSE 'Item'
    END AS Listing,
    CAST(SalesYear AS varchar(10)) as SalesYear,
    SalesQuarter as SalesQuarter,
    PRODUCT as product,
    concat('$ ',format('%,.2f',round(SUM(SalesTotal),2))) AS SalesTotal 
FROM 
    CUSTOM_RESULTS_VIEW_DEMO_DBO.SALES_REPORT 
where 1=1
GROUP BY GROUPING SETS(PRODUCT, (PRODUCT,SalesYear),(PRODUCT,SalesYear,SalesQuarter),())
order by 4,2,3
